subject: Re: How are you enjoying Ark ES Executive Standing Desk (60"x26")?
raw_subject: Re: How are you enjoying Ark ES Executive Standing Desk (60"x26")?
description:
Haven't assembled it yet.  Was shipped to a house we are remodeling and not living there yet.  Won't be used until a few weeks from now.
Steve Howard
